attributes.action: Help Abandon The Stoke City "AWAY" Card
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For years this generation of Stoke City fans has had to live with the reputation of the past generation. Stoke City Football Club have a "True Supporters Membership Scheme" which has seen football hooligans washed away from the traditional "away day". However, the ordinary fan who wants to go to an away game now has to carry I.D and i request a petition that this be removed

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
